snippet: Stocks closed higher after several big companies reported better-than-expected earnings. Citigroup, Intel, Netflix and eBay all beat analysts’ forecasts.
abstract: United States stocks are pushed higher due to news that financial lifeline has been extended to Greece and due to strong corporate earnings reports.
lead_paragraph: Stocks closed higher after several big companies reported better-than-expected earnings. Citigroup, Intel, Netflix and eBay all beat analysts’ forecasts.

headline.main: Market Rises on a Raft of Solid Corporate Results
headline.print_headline: Surprising Earnings Lift Markets as Concerns Abroad Diminish
